content: 1fltr2d 1dc blo repeat from * to last *2fltr2d 5dc blo 1fltr2d 1dc blo 3 times 4dc blo 3 sts 1fltr2d 2dc fasten_off 2fltr2d 1dc blo repeat from * to last 3 sts 1fltr2d 2dc row 38 using a standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 1dc blo 1fltr2d fasten_off *2dc blo 1fltr2d 1dc blo 1fltr2d 2dc blo 1fltr2d repeat row 15 using b standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 1dc in blo in every from * to last 3 sts 1dc blo 2dc fasten_off st to last 2 sts 2dc fasten_off row 39 using b standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 1fltr2d 1dc blo row 16 using a as row 14 fasten_off *1dc blo 1fltr2d 2dc blo repeat from * to last 3 sts 1fltr2d row 17 using b standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 2dc blo *2dc blo 2dc fasten_off 1fltr2d 1dc blo 1fltr2d 9dc blo 1fltr2d 1dc blo 1fltr2d row 40 using a standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 2dc blo * 1fltr2d 3dc blo repeat from * to last 3 sts 1dc blo 2dc fasten_off 2dc blo twice 1fltr2d 1dc blo repeat from * to last 3 sts row 18 using a standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 2fltr2d *5dc blo 1dc blo 2dc fasten_off 1fltr2d 1dc blo 5 times 4dc blo 1fltr2d repeat from * to last row 41 using b standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 2fltr2d *1dc blo 3 sts 1fltr2d 2dc fasten_off 2fltr2d 1dc blo twice 1fltr2d repeat from * to last 3 sts row 19 using b standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 2dc blo * 1fltr2d 1fltr2d 2dc fasten_off 1dc blo 1fltr2d 5dc blo twice 1fltr2d 1dc blo twice row 42 using a as row 1 fasten_off repeat from * to last 3 sts 1dc blo 2dc fasten_off row 20 using a standing double_crochet in 1st st 1dc 2fltr2d *3dc blo 1fltr2d 1dc blo 1fltr2d 3dc blo 1fltr2d twice 1dc blo 1fltr2d 3dc blo 1fltr2d repeat from * to last 3 sts 1fltr2d 2dc fasten_off written pattern wrapping up note in this final part of the lapland cal we will be making the edging to hide all the tails this will be a double-sided edging which will enclose all ends before starting the edging all the ends of yarn need to be tidied to do this tie the ends in pairs with double knots this will ensure the ends will not unravel and then trim them to about 2 5cm back edging foundation round with ws of blanket facing and a starting from the top left corner work 1 standing double_crochet in between the 2nd and 3rd st from the edge working around the strands between of the 3rd row from the top now work 1dc in every row in between the 2nd and 3rd st from the edge until you have 2 row left 123dc 2ch corner chain-2sp made turn to work along foundation miss 1st 2 sts 1dc into front loop of every st of chainless foundation to last
